shows.title: The Politics Of Climate Change
shows.desc:
A politics that looks beyond national borders and seeks to build international cooperation and consensus must play a part in the fight to avert climate breakdown. As the UK teeters on the edge of a Halloween exit from the EU, MEP Catherine Rowett argues passionately for the need for a European-wide, political approach to combatting climate chaos.

Catherine Rowett, the Green Party’s newly elected MEP for the East of England, was previously a Professor of Philosophy at the University of East Anglia.
